info.name: Detect websites using Herokuapp endpoints

User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)

Accept: */*

Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: Detect Springboot Information page
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Displays app name and version information among others values

request:
GET /actuator/info HTTP/1.1
Host: www.sipsi.travail.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
